DOC.detailed_description: This trial examine comparative effectiveness cost-effectiveness web-based HIV , hepatitis STI prevention intervention offer youth outpatient , community-based substance abuse treatment directly compare traditional HIV ( infectious disease ) prevention intervention . We assess comparative effectiveness cost-effectiveness intervention primarily examine change pre- post-intervention accurate HIV/disease prevention knowledge , intention engage safe sex HIV risk behavior . Additionally , examine extent intervention impact relevant skill acquisition ( e.g. , communication skill , negotiation skill condom use skill ) , attitudes toward safe sex self-reported substance use , well acceptability intervention . We also plan evaluate youth 1 3 month post-intervention examine durability effect ( include differential durability effect across intervention condition ) . The web-delivered prevention intervention evaluate study potential allow complex intervention deliver low cost , without increase demand staff time training need , may thereby expand reach evidence-based prevention youth substance-abuse treatment . This study conduct three collaborating , community-based adolescent substance abuse treatment program house within Daytop Village network service locate New York City : ( 1 ) Daytop Village 's Brooklyn Outreach Center ; ( 2 ) Daytop Village 's Bronx Outreach Center ; ( 3 ) Daytop Village 's Queens Outreach Center . We expect recruit approximately one third total number participant site . A total 160 ( few 120 ) adolescent participant enrol study . Participants randomly assign one two study condition intent-to-treat design ( n=60-80 per group ) : ( 1 ) computer-delivered intervention ( 2 ) traditional ( person-delivered intervention ) . Participants traditional prevention intervention condition complete two session ( approx . one hour duration ) across course week , conduct trained HIV ( infectious disease ) prevention educator ; session typically conduct small group 2-4 participant may offer individually . Participants computer-delivered intervention condition complete interactive , web-based HIV , hepatitis STI prevention program instead traditional , person-delivered prevention intervention . Youth ask complete customized plan approximately 2-4 hour length use web-based tool ; participant complete two 60-minute session per week complete customize plan .
